thread.title: M L Smith
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by M L Smith

author: M L Smith
title: M L Smith
text:
I have purchased books from Thrift Books for many years and have yet to have a disappointing transaction.
The condition of each book purchased has been exactly as described and has arrived promptly.
I highly recommend Thrift Books for anyone looking for reasonably priced new/used books.
